project.name: opencode-md-table-formatter
project.description: Automatic Markdown table formatting for OpenCode AI coding assistant, optimized for concealment mode. Ensures tables align perfectly when Markdown symbols are hidden.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Optimized for OpenCode concealment mode, automatically formats AI-generated Markdown tables

list.title: Concealment Mode Alignment
list.desc: Optimized for OpenCode concealment mode, correctly calculates display width to ensure tables align perfectly when Markdown symbols are hidden

list.title: Auto-Format After AI Generation
list.desc: Automatically triggered via experimental.text.complete hook, no manual operation required after AI generates text

list.title: Code Block Protection
list.desc: Protects Markdown symbols inside inline code blocks from incorrect stripping, ensuring syntax remains intact

list.title: Three Alignment Options
list.desc: Supports left alignment (:---), center alignment (:---:), and right alignment (---:) formats

list.title: Nested Markdown Handling
list.desc: Uses multi-pass regex algorithm to handle nested Markdown syntax like bold, italic, and strikethrough

list.title: Edge Case Compatibility
list.desc: Correctly handles Emojis, Unicode characters, empty cells, and long content

list.title: Silent Operation
list.desc: No console log output, errors don't interrupt workflow, formatting completes silently

list.title: Validation Feedback
list.desc: Provides friendly error comment hints for invalid tables to help users quickly identify issues
